body_html:
I just submitted a fix internally... it should go out to github in the next sync.

If this is a blocker for you then a simple workaround is to add the code below here:

  } else if ((domain == CUPTI_CB_DOMAIN_RUNTIME_API) &&
             (cbid == CUPTI_RUNTIME_TRACE_CBID_cudaMemcpy_v3020 ||
              cbid == CUPTI_RUNTIME_TRACE_CBID_cudaMemcpyAsync_v3020)) {
body:
I just submitted a fix internally... it should go out to github in the next sync.  

If this is a blocker for you then a simple workaround is to add the code below [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.9/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_tracer.cc#L488):

```
  } else if ((domain == CUPTI_CB_DOMAIN_RUNTIME_API) &&
             (cbid == CUPTI_RUNTIME_TRACE_CBID_cudaMemcpy_v3020 ||
              cbid == CUPTI_RUNTIME_TRACE_CBID_cudaMemcpyAsync_v3020)) {
```
